text:
Поздрави,

Екипът на ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД

 



 

From: Loukopoulou Georgia <GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr> 
Sent: Friday, April 12, 2024 1:26 PM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>
Cc: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; OfficeGR <officegr@tibiel.com>; Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr>; Kotsiou Eirini <EKotsiou@eurobank.gr>; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr>; Investors Administration <Investorsadmin@eurobank.gr>; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr>
Subject: FW: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 02/2024

 

Dear Thanasi,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Further to our telecom please find attached the files in word format and translated, please confirm that you can now process.

Regarding the authorized persons of your good company(for sending and receiving orders ) these are  mentioned to the attached standing order instruction.

 

Furthermore,  in order to get access to the e-banking network please refer  to the attached communication, we are waiting for your response. 

 

At your disposal,

Georgia

 

Georgia Loukopoulou

Sales & Relationship Management 

Securities Services 

Transaction Banking

 



 

EUROBANK S.A. 

2-6, Pesmazoglou Str.

GR 105 59, Athens, Greece 

t. +30 214 40 58 978 (58978)

e-mail: gloukopoulou@eurobank.gr <mailto:gloukopoulou@eurobank.gr> 

 

   

 

 

 

From: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, April 11, 2024 10:14 AM
To: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >; Loukopoulou Georgia <GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr <mailto:GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr> >
Cc: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >; OfficeGR <officegr@tibiel.com <mailto:officegr@tibiel.com> >; Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr <mailto:anpalamidas@eurobank.gr> >; Kotsiou Eirini <EKotsiou@eurobank.gr <mailto:EKotsiou@eurobank.gr> >; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr <mailto:GCM@eurobank.gr> >; Investors Administration <Investorsadmin@eurobank.gr <mailto:Investorsadmin@eurobank.gr> >; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr <mailto:SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr> >
Subject: RE: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 02/2024

 

	CAUTION: This is an EXTERNAL Email. Please DO NOT open attachments, click links or reply, unless you have verified the sender and know the content is safe. 

	ΠΡΟΣΟΧΗ: Το Email προέρχεται από ΕΞΩΤΕΡΙΚΗ ΠΗΓΗ. Παρακαλούμε ΜΗΝ απαντήσετε, MHN ανοίξετε attachments & MHN ακολουθήσετε links, πριν βεβαιωθείτε οτι ο αποστολέας και το περιεχόμενο είναι ασφαλή. 

 

Dear Georgia,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I am reaching out regarding the attached invoices. Unfortunately, they appear to be unreadable. Could you please provide them to us in a different format that is more legible?

 

Furthermore, I'd like to address recent internal changes within Tibiel. With these changes in mind, we need to ensure that only authorized individuals have access to our Tibiel Eurobank account. Could you please clarify who currently has access to the account? This will enable us to remove any individuals who are no longer authorized and add those who will be responsible for managing our account moving forward.

 

Your prompt attention to these matters would be greatly appreciated.

 

Looking forward to your response.

 

Best regards,

Thanasis

 

Athanasios Karantzis  

Head of Supply and Gas Trading  of TIBIEL EOOD in Greece

M:+30 697 9073017 P: +30 216 0702506

E-mail: akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> 



 

 

 

 

 

From: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, April 10, 2024 3:06 PM
To: Loukopoulou Georgia <GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr <mailto:GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr> >
Cc: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >; OfficeGR <officegr@tibiel.com <mailto:officegr@tibiel.com> >; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> >; Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr <mailto:anpalamidas@eurobank.gr> >; Kotsiou Eirini <EKotsiou@eurobank.gr <mailto:EKotsiou@eurobank.gr> >; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr <mailto:GCM@eurobank.gr> >; Investors Administration <Investorsadmin@eurobank.gr <mailto:Investorsadmin@eurobank.gr> >; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr <mailto:SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr> >
Subject: RE: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 02/2024

 

Thank you and have a nice day!

 

Regards,

TIBIEL'S TEAM

Thank you in advance!

 

Kind regards,

Dear all,

 

May we ask you to send us the invoices issued by Eurobank SA on 04.12.2023 and 02.02.2024 regarding:

Sub-account maintenance fees and market clearing fees for trades executed on the Natural Gas Platform.

Thank you in advance!

 

Kind regards,

TIBIEL'S TEAM

From: Papagianneli Melpomeni <MPapagianneli@eurobank.gr <mailto:MPapagianneli@eurobank.gr> > 
Sent: Friday, March 8, 2024 2:21 PM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> >; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> >

Attached you will find the invoice issued by Eurobank SA regarding:

 

The fees for the maintenance of Sub-Accounts and the Market Clearing fees for the trades executed at the Natural Gas Platform in February 2024.

 

We are at your disposal for any further clarification.

 

 

Kind regards,

 

 

Melpomeni Papagianneli

Senior Securities & Funds Administrator

 

General Member Clearing Services

Group Investment Products Operations

 



 

ΤΡΑΠΕΖΑ EUROBANK A.E.

142 34  Nea Ionia, Athens, Greece
